import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_URL='http://localhost:5001';function AssignmentsPage(){const{courseId}=useParams();const[course,setCourse]=useState(null);const[newAssignment,setNewAssignment]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{fetchCourse();// eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps
},[]);const fetchCourse=async()=>{const{data}=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/courses"));const selectedCourse=data.find(course=>course._id===courseId);setCourse(selectedCourse);};const addAssignment=async()=>{const{data}=await axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/courses/").concat(courseId,"/assignments"),{title:newAssignment});setCourse(data);setNewAssignment('');};const selectAssignment=assignmentId=>{navigate("/comments/".concat(courseId,"/").concat(assignmentId));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Assignments for ",course===null||course===void 0?void 0:course.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/'),children:"Back to Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Add new assignment",value:newAssignment,onChange:e=>setNewAssignment(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:addAssignment,children:"Add Assignment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:course===null||course===void 0?void 0:course.assignments.map(assignment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>selectAssignment(assignment._id),children:assignment.title},assignment._id))})]});}export default AssignmentsPage;
